Package com.marcosavard.commons.text

Class Dictionary

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marcosavard.commons.text.Dictionary
  • public class Dictionary
extends java.lang.Object
    A word dictionary. A dictionary contains a list of valid words, ordered by their length, and then by the alphabetical order.
    Author:
    Marco

      • findSuggestions

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> findSuggestions​(java.lang.String misspelled,
                                                        int maxSuggestions)
        Find a list of words similar to a given misspelled word. For instance, findSuggestions("achetter", 1) will return "acheter".
        Parameters:
        misspelled - word
        maxSuggestions - (5 by default)
        Returns:
        a list of suggested words
